text: Ndipo kwa anthu oopa zidzanenedwa kuti, “Kodi Ambuye wanu adavumbulutsa zotani?” Iwo adzati, “Zabwino.” Mphotho yabwino idzakhala ya iwo amene adachita ntchito zabwino m’moyo uno. Koma nyumba yabwino kwambiri ndi mphotho ya moyo umene uli nkudza ndi mtendere wabwino ndiponso nyumba ya anthu oopa Mulungu
